Instruction: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). Coat the baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray.

In a small bowl, combine cumin, coriander, ginger, cinnamon, pepper, and salt. In a large bowl, break up the ground turkey; gradually incorporate the seasoning mixture with your hands, ensuring an even distribution. Shape the mixture into 8 equal balls, then roll each turkey ball into a tube shape on a flat surface.

Spray a large skillet with nonstick cooking spray and heat it over medium heat. Add the turkey tubes to the skillet and cook, turning frequently, until they are golden brown all over. Transfer them to a baking sheet.
Bake in the preheated oven for approximately 6 minutes.
